profile:
Delicate Touch Renovations loves to paint. Its  true. We actually like  to do the one thing so many people  hate to do.
 
We also love to install hardwood or laminate flooring, baseboards, window and door trim, doors, crown moulding, build custom decks and fences.
 
In fact we just love to renovate houses. Its our passion. Its very exciting to see a project through from beginning to end. 
 
We have satisfied many Hamilton area home owners with our professional attitude, our knowledge and our skillful staff. We also have lots of happy customers in Burlington, Oakville, Niagara and Toronto that are willing to verfiy our abilities.
 
Painting a home is not an easy task and requires special skills to ensure it is done properly from start to finish.
 
We take pride in our work and treat every client's home or office as if it were our own. Our many, many references speak volumes about our dedication to quality. 
 
With over 30 years of experience painting high end homes, large commercial properties and other projects, Delicate Touch Renovations  can guarantee your project is done properly, on time and on budget.
  
We are committed to getting the job done right the first time. 
 
Our attention to detail and work habits, coupled with high integrity, makes doing business with Delicate Touch Renovations very simple and painless as possible.
 
Servicing Hamilton, Burlington, Oakville, GTA
30 Years Experience
References available on request (please be nice to them)
Call for your free estimate 289-489-5634
You can also email us through this website
1 year warranty on labor
Flooring, trim installation services available
